name: The Rage of Mugamba
tooltip:
The Rage of MugambaLevel 60

King Rastakhan sends his regards, Master <name>. Such an honor has never been given to one outside the Zandalar tribe.



Give me your talisman so that I may enhance it once more. Know that the Rage of Mugamba is now intrinsically connected to your very soul.

Requirements:
- Strength of Mugamba
